question:
Which of the following activities has/have been proposed under the Jal Kranti Abhiyaan?
  1. Jal Gram Yojana
  2. Development of Model Command Area
  3. Pollution Abatement
  4. Massive Awareness Programme
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: Jal Kranti Abhiyan was launched by the Ministry of Water Resources, River Development and Ganga Rejuvenation in June 2015 across the nation to preserve the precious water. It includes following activities under it viz. Jal Gram Yojana, Development of Model Command Area, Pollution Abatement and Mass Awareness Programme.
